name: Monster Jump
description:
So now you’re a space monster jumping in the space. Jump from platform to platform, collect more coins and grab useful power-ups. Avoid collisions with asteroids, space mines and robots and jump as much higher. Just tilt your device or press left or right on keyboard to move left/right then tap the screen to shoot. This game template created using Construct 2. 

Buy the game source (CAPX file).
